main.name: Erdo Waka Septyano
main.bio: Hi there! I have been very passionate about computers and programming since my university life. I dream to be an expert software engineer so that I can build professional and useful software that has business value. I am looking for a junior software engineer position in a reputed software company that can help me to achieve my goal.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build any software for your business.!

quotes1.title: I Would Love to make your Ideas real
quotes1.description: I love fishing and learn about new think and have been working on my portfolio since 2020. You can download my resume in order to learn the details of my life as a programmer and freelancer. Contact me and we will discuss your projects!

quotes2.title: I can give your business a new creative start right away! Hire me for your Awesome project
quotes2.description: If You interest in, come contact me

testimonials.text: Bisa di ajak negosiasi, enak di ajak diskusi.

services.title: IT Support
services.description: IT Support adalah teknisi pada organisasi atau perusahaan yang memiliki tanggung jawab untuk instalasi, evaluasi dan peningkatan terhadap tiga objek utama yaitu komputer, software, dan pengembangan sistem jaringan (network system).

services.title: Web Design
services.description: Web designer atau perancang web adalah profesi yang dijalankan oleh orang-orang yang pekerjaannya membuat desain sebuah website.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Web Developer adalah Pengembang Web yang bekerja untuk merancang, membuat, dan memelihara situs web dan aplikasi web.
